name: JS Release 3.18.0
description: This JavaScript release brings new features to our LoginRadius V2JS library, please see below for details:

ADDED.text: LoginRadius V2 JS now supports the LoginOnPasswordReset feature.
Added the feature of sending RBA email alerts on unusual customer behavior in MFA flows in LoginRadius V2JS.

IMPROVED.text: Added error handling for loading IDX in an iframe in Google Chromeâ€™s private mode.
